title: 01/21/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/21/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show were joined by a handful of guests from around Sports Media. Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix joins us to discuss last night's Nets loss to the Cavs. What are they missing at this point? The MMQB's Andrew Brandt tells us why he thinks neither Deshaun Watson or Carson Wentz will be traded. Chris Berman calls in to preview this weekend's games and tell us how he became a Bills fan. And Ian Eagle explains what's been the toughest part of doing NFL and Nets games these past couple months.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show were joined by a handful of guests from around Sports Media. Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix joins us to discuss last night's Nets loss to the Cavs. What are they missing at this point? The MMQB's Andrew Brandt tells us why he thinks neither Deshaun Watson or Carson Wentz will be traded. Chris Berman calls in to preview this weekend's games and tell us how he became a Bills fan. And Ian Eagle explains what's been the toughest part of doing NFL and Nets games these past couple months.
